item.title: Binance Becomes First Major Crypto Exchange To Offer Parent-Controlled Crypto Accounts For Kids
item.description: Binance Junior allows children and teens aged 6–17 to hold crypto under parental supervision.

item.title: Silver Extends Blistering Rally With Yet Another Record High
item.description: The XAG/USD pair rose to an all-time high of $58.95 an ounce on Wednesday before paring some of the gains.

item.title: Bitcoin Climbs Above $93,000, Wiping Out Over $400 Million In Short Bets
item.description: Bitcoin shorts accounted for about $226 million of the liquidations.
